task.title: Run BI Reports in Workforce Management
task.shortdesc: Business Intelligence (BI) reporting is available for Workforce Management through the Workforce Management Analysis package. This BI package enables you to derive deeper strategic insights into your workforce. BI is accessed through the Administration menu item in UltiPro (Administration > Business Intelligence).

step.cmd: From the Cognos Analytics home page, navigate to the Workforce Management Analysis package (Team Content > UltiPro BI Content > UltiPro BI for Workforce Management > UltiPro Workforce Management Delivered Packages).
step.info: The package contains information for the Time feature only. The package is divided into two reporting areas:

ul.li: Time and Labor Analysis – This includes all the dimensions and the single measure, Total Edit Duration. Total Edit Duration enables you to analyze the edits made to an employee’s timesheet. Time and Labor Analysis provides summary information for strategic reporting.Time and Labor Analysis

Reporting – This includes the Employee and Timesheets query subjects. You can report on attributes relating to the employee (for example, primary job or preferred language). Information is provided in the timezone of the person entering the information. The Reporting area provides detailed information for drill through reporting.Reporting folder

step.cmd: From Cognos Connections, select Launch and then select Report Studio from the drop-down list.
Drag data items from the Source pane to the report layout.
Save and then run the report.
